operations.notes: Note: Ensure IdP Discovery and/or WS-Federation is enabled for redirect validation to function for IdP Discovery and/or wreply for SLO respectively.

responseMessages.message: The request was improperly formatted or contained invalid fields.

RedirectValidationSettingsWhitelistEntry.description: Whitelist entry for valid target resource.

targetResourceSSO.description: Enable this target resource for SSO redirect validation.

targetResourceSLO.description: Enable this target resource for SLO redirect validation.

inErrorResource.description: Enable this target resource for in error resource validation.

idpDiscovery.description: Enable this target resource for IdP discovery validation.

requireHttps.description: Require HTTPS for accessing this resource.

allowQueryAndFragment.description: Allow any query parameters and fragment in the resource.

RedirectValidationPartnerSettings.description: Settings for redirection at a partner site.

RedirectValidationSettings.description: Settings for redirect validation for SSO, SLO and IdP discovery.

redirectValidationPartnerSettings.description: Settings for redirection at a partner site.

enableTargetResourceValidationForSSO.description: Enable target resource validation for SSO.

enableTargetResourceValidationForSLO.description: Enable target resource validation for SLO.

enableTargetResourceValidationForIdpDisc.description: Enable target resource validation for IdP discovery.

whiteList.description: List of URLs that are designated as valid target resources.
